#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int t,len,br2,br;
string x,s,niz[10000];
int main () {
 scanf ("%d",&t);
 for (int i=1;i<=t;i++){
  cin>>s;

  br2=0;
  br=0;
  len=s.size ();
  for (int l=0;l<len;l++){
   for (int r=l;r<len;r++){
   x=s.substr (l,r-l+1);
    br++;
    niz[br]=x;
    }
  }
    sort(niz+1,niz+br+1);

   for (int j=1;j<=br;j++){
    if (niz[j]!=niz[j-1]) br2++;
   }


    printf ("%d\n",br2);
 }
return 0;}
